entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing overnight. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 early this evening then becoming light late this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 3 May 2023
